mapper.insert: insert into repair_station (id, station_name, address, lng, lat, isdel) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update repair_station set station_name = #{stationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lng = #{lng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lat = #{lat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isdel = #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, station_name, address, lng, lat, isdel from repair_station
